mapper.insert: insert into nm_plan( group_no, member_no, start_date, end_date, title, category, thumbnail, content, address, latitude, longitude ) values( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{category}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
insert into nm_plan_member( plan_no, group_no, member_no, attend ) values ( #{planNo}, #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{attend} )
mapper.select: select p.plan_no, pm.attend, pm.group_no, m.member_name, m.member_no from nm_member m join nm_plan_member pm on pm.member_no = m.member_no join nm_plan p on p.plan_no = #{planNo} where pm.group_no = p.group_no
select plan_no, title, create_date from nm_plan where group_no=#{groupNo} order by plan_no desc

select group_no, plan_no, member_no, DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') end_date, title, content, thumbnail, category, address, create_date from nm_plan where plan_no=#{planBoardNo}

select p.plan_no, p.group_no, p.member_no, DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') end_date, p.title, p.category, p.content, p.thumbnail, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%H:%i') start_hour, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%H:%i') end_hour, p.address, p.latitude, p.longitude, p.create_date, p.back_color, m.member_name from nm_plan p join nm_member m where p.group_no=#{planNo} and m.member_no=p.member_no order by plan_no desc
select plan_no, title, create_date from nm_plan where plan_no like #{keywordPattern} or title like #{keywordPattern}
